title: Top 5 Apps on F-Droid That Are Not on Google Play Store
tags: Top 5 Apps on F-Droid That Are Not on Google Play Store
Top 10 F-droid Best Apps (Not on Google Play)
description:
What's F-Droid you ask?

Well, itâ€™s kind of like Google play store, but it only hosts the apps that are free and open source. 

You can either download F-droid first and then download these apps, by searching on it (like you do on Google Play) or you can simply sideload the following apps.


1. Yalp store 
https://f-droid.org/packages/link.standen.michael.phonesaver/

2. Chromium SWE Updater https://f-droid.org/packages/chromiumupdater.bamless.com.chromiumsweupdater/

3. Clover
https://f-droid.org/packages/org.floens.chan/

4. NewPipe 
https://f-droid.org/packages/org.schabi.newpipe/

5. DNS66 
https://f-droid.org/packages/org.jak_linux.dns66/

Few others worth checking out.


AdAway - best ad blocker, needs root though
https://f-droid.org/packages/org.adaway/

Lightning Browser - fast browser with ad blocking
https://f-droid.org/packages/acr.browser.lightning/

AsciiCam a pixellated style camera app. weird but fun
https://f-droid.org/packages/com.dozingcatsoftware.asciicam

cSploit network hacking and man in the middle attack needs root
https://f-droid.org/packages/org.csploit.android/ 

Phone saver - save file from share menu
https://f-droid.org/packages/link.standen.michael.phonesaver/

AntennaPod - a decent podcast app, but not the best
https://f-droid.org/packages/de.danoeh.antennapod/

You can find some other F-Droid apps here.
http://techwiser.com/f-droid-best-apps/
